app_title: 🎸 吉他指板视觉化练习工具
page_title: 吉他指板视觉化练习工具
shortcut_hint: 按 ESC 返回主菜单
chord_type_hint: 选择要练习的和弦类型
chord_order_hint: 选择和弦音符的演奏顺序
melodic_structure_6: 5,6,7,2 on major/dominant chords; 5,7,1,2 on minor chords; 5,6,7,1 on diminished chords
melodic_structure_7: 6,5,2,7 on major/dominant chords; 7,5,2,1 on minor chords; 6,5,1,7 on diminished chords
melodic_structure_8: 7,2,6,5 on major/dominant chords; 1,2,7,5 on minor chords; 6,1,7,5 on diminished chords
melodic_structure_9: 2,7,6,5 on major/dominant chords; 2,1,7,5 on minor chords; 2,7,1,6 on diminished chords
voice_led_structure_1: 3,2,1,7 on minor/dominant/major chords; 4,2,1,7 on sus chords; 3,2,1,6 on diminished chords
voice_led_structure_2: 3,2,1,7 on minor chords; 3,5,7,2 on dominant chords; 5,1,2,3 on major chords; 4,5,7,2 on sus chords; 3,2,1,6 on diminished chords
voice_led_structure_3: 1,3,5,7 on minor chords; 3,2,1,7 on dominant/major chords; 4,2,1,7 on sus chords; 3,2,1,6 on diminished chords
voice_led_structure_4: 1,3,5,7 on minor chords; 3,5,7,2 on dominant chords; 3,2,1,7 on major chords; 4,5,7,2 on sus chords; 3,2,1,6 on diminished chords
voice_led_structure_5: 5,3,1,7 on minor chords; 3,5,7,2 on dominant chords; 3,2,1,7 on major chords; 4,5,7,2 on sus chords; 3,2,1,6 on diminished chords
chord_scale_root_to_root: All chord scale notes from root through octave
chord_scale_3rd_to_3rd: All chord scale notes from 3rd through octave
chord_scale_5th_to_5th: All chord scale notes from 5th through octave
chord_scale_7th_to_7th: All chord scale notes from 7th through octave
chord_scale_random_chord_tone: All chord scale notes from random chord tone
chord_scale_random_scale_tone: All chord scale notes from random scale tone
passing_note_scale_root_to_root: All chord scale notes with passing notes from root to root
